title: 53 Great Windows XP Tweaks -  by QuaSarR
description:
53 Great Windows XP Tweaks:


Be aware: messing with registry is dangerous unless you know what you are doing!



Note: if you don't know what is it, ...don't even bother, and don't touch it!



1. Clear Cache on Reboot

2. Clear Page File on Exit + Undo

3. Disable or  Enable Check Disk Upon Boot

4. Empty Temporary Internet Files on Exit

5. Add Clipboard to the Control Panel

6. Add Command Line to the Right Click

7. Add Control Panel - Start Button (Right Click)

8. Add Copy To Move  To(Right Click)

9. Add Explore CD-Rom to Start Button (RC)

10. Add Icon Cache Size to Folder Options View

11. Add Notepad as a Right Click Item

12. Add Open New Window to the Right Click

13. Add or Remove Programs Restriction

14. Add Show Related Links to Internet Explorer

15. Add System Information to the Right Click

16. Add Windows Explorer to the Right Click

17. Align Drop Down Menu's to the Right

18. Allow Changes Being Made to Taskbar

19. Allow or  Disable CD Burn Options

20. Auto End Tasks per User  or  Per System

21. Auto End Tasks to Enable a Proper Shutdown  + Undo

22. Change Size of Desktop Wallpaper to Suit  + Undo

23. Change the Recycle Bin Icon  + Undo

24. Change Thumbnail View to 96 or 32

25. Clear Disabled Items from Msconfig Startup & Selective

26. Clipboard Reader

27. Disable Installer - Enable Installer

28. Disable or  Enable Resize Graphic - Send To

29. Enable the Task Manager -  Disable - Repair

30. Enable - Disable  Show Hidden Files & Folders

31. EXE (lnk and regfile) Fix for Windows XP

32. Expand System in the Start Menu - Control Panel

33. Home Page Lock -  Home Page Unlock

34. Increase the Size of Taskbar Buttons  + Undo

35. Lift Active Desktop Restrictions

36. MS Windows  File Extension Identifier

37. Optimize Hard Drive When Idle  + Undo

38. Prevent Delay Opening My Computer - Explorer

39. Replace - Repair the Recycle Bin in Windows XP

40. Restore  Open With  on the Right Click

41. Restore  Run As  to the Right Click  + Undo

42. Restore System Restore Service

43. Restore the Device Manager

44. Save Settings on Exit  -  Don't Save Settings

45. Send To Desktop (Create Desktop Shortcut) Fix

46. Show All Hidden Devices in the Device Manager

47. Show Boot Configuration(s)

48. Shutdown Shortcut

49. Speedup Browsing (Explorer and IE)  + Undo

50. Speedup Network Logon-Boot

51. Windows Update Greyed Out - Restore

52. Windows XP Doesn't Save User Settings

53. IP-DNS Tricks & Fixes





Note: If you find text file like this >>  .reg.txt  <<    just remove  >> .txt <<,  and then double click to register tweak with your windows registry.









All CLEAN - no viruses, no worms, no trojans - scanned by Kaspersky IS v8.0.0.454

No scams, no password protected files, no fake, no infected uploads.  NO bullshit!

Please SEED!
